bug.author: nptech9806
bug.description: NotImplementedError: Dtype category not understood. Traceback: File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/streamlit/init.py", line 409, in write dataframe(arg) # noqa: F821 File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/streamlit/init.py", line 152, in wrapped_method return method.get(dg)(*args, **kwargs) File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/streamlit/DeltaGenerator.py", line 88, in wrapped_method return method(self, *args, **kwargs) File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/streamlit/DeltaGenerator.py", line 887, in dataframe set_data_frame, "dataframe", elementWidth=width, elementHeight=height File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/streamlit/DeltaGenerator.py", line 392, in _enqueue_new_element_delta rv = marshall_element(msg.delta.new_element) File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/streamlit/DeltaGenerator.py", line 884, in set_data_frame data_frame_proto.marshall_data_frame(data, delta.data_frame) File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/streamlit/elements/data_frame_proto.py", line 50, in marshall_data_frame _marshall_table(df_data, proto_df.data) File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/streamlit/elements/data_frame_proto.py", line 256, in _marshall_table _marshall_any_array(pandas_array, proto_table.cols.add()) File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/streamlit/elements/data_frame_proto.py", line 297, in _marshall_any_array raise NotImplementedError("Dtype %s not understood." % pandas_array.dtype)

comments.comment:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nptech9806>@nptech9806</denchmark-link> , Thanks for the bug report. It looks like your bug is related to a previously reported issue about showing Categorical variables in Streamlit. The current workaround is as follows: <denchmark-code>st.write(df.astype('object')) </denchmark-code>
I'm closing this issue as a duplicate; please follow the open Issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/streamlit/streamlit/issues/47>#47</denchmark-link> for updates.
